question: Which amendment extended the ban on readjustment of seats in the Lok Sabha and the state legislative assemblies for another 25 years with the objective of encouraging population limiting measures?
explanation: The 84th Amendment Act of 2001 extended the ban on readjustment of seats in the Lok Sabha and the state legislative assemblies for another 25 years (i.e., up to 2026). It had the same objective of encouraging population limiting measures.
